task.title: How to have an Animal Presentation in AirClassroom
task.shortdesc: These instructions will show you how to safely present with animals in an AirClassroom

step.cmd: Put all animals in cages and cover them with blankets before presenting
Tell your audience that animals are freightened easily by loud noises and that they need to be quiet during the presentation
Proceed to present all materials involving the projector first
Present each animal (python, hawk, turtle, baby leopard, and tucan) one by one
step.info: After you take off one blanket on the animal you present, remember to put it back on its cage or aquarium when you move to the next one

step.cmd: Keep animals distracted with treats so they do not get restless
Let audience members ask questions then touch some of the animals
step.info: Don't let audiences touch the hawk as it is much more dangerous than the other animals

step.cmd: Clean up any animal droppings with the broom and trash bag found in the closet
Take animals outside of the classroom
Lock the door with your temporary key
